Package org.daisy.dotify.api.tasks

Provides an API for tasks.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotatedFile
    Provides an annotated file
    CompiledTaskSystem
    Provides a compiled task system, which provides the tasks to execute as well as its name and relevant options.
    FileDetails
    Provides details regarding a file.
    TaskGroup
    a task group is a file/fileset conversion unit.
    TaskGroupFactory
    Provides an interface for task group factories.
    TaskGroupFactoryMakerService
    Provides an interface for a TaskGroupFactoryMaker service.
    TaskSystem
    TaskSystem is an interface used when compiling a series of InternalTasks that may require both global Transformer parameters and individual constructor arguments.
    TaskSystemFactory
    Provides an interface for task system factories.
    TaskSystemFactoryMakerService
    Provides an interface for a TaskSystemFactoryMaker service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultAnnotatedFile
    Provides a default implementation of AnnotatedFile
    DefaultAnnotatedFile.Builder
    Provides a builder for an annotated file
    DefaultCompiledTaskSystem
    Provides a default implementation of a compiled task system
    ExpandingTask
    Provides an abstract base for expanding tasks.
    InternalTask
    Base class for internal tasks.
    ReadOnlyTask
    Provides an abstract base for read only tasks.
    ReadWriteTask
    Provides an abstract base for read/write tasks.
    TaskGroupInformation
    Provides information about a task group.
    TaskGroupInformation.Builder
    Provides a builder for task group information
    TaskGroupSpecification
    Provides a specification for creating a task group instance.
    TaskGroupSpecification.Builder
    Provides a task group specification builder.
    TaskOption
    Provides a task option.
    TaskOption.Builder
    Creates a task option builder.
    TaskOptionValue
    Provides a value and the description of that value, to be used in a finite list of acceptable values for a task option.
    TaskOptionValue.Builder
    Provides a task option value builder.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TaskGroupActivity
    Defines task group activites.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InternalTaskException
    An InternalTaskException is an exception that indicates conditions in an InternalTask that a reasonable application might want to catch.
    TaskSystemException
    A TaskSystemException is an exception that indicates conditions in a TaskSystem that a reasonable application might want to catch.
    TaskSystemFactoryException
    A TaskSystemFactoryException is an exception that indicates conditions in a TaskSystemFactory that a reasonable application might want to catch.

Package org.daisy.dotify.api.tasks Description

Provides an API for tasks.
